value.bottomText: MAYA means courage. Boldness. True grit.
value.descriptionText: Our mission is to  catalyze transformation in Latin America by partnering with the region's top entrepreneurs. Together, we will create an unbreakable cycle of innovation, empowerment and change. MAYA is a  startup investing in startups. We are led by authentic, motivated and diverse leaders who envision the impossible. Our success is directly tied to that of our entrepreneurs, so we believe in long-term partnerships.

items.name: Lead your first venture round
items.text: We invest in founders' first institutional round. Our investment process is thorough, yet quick, where we leverage our network to build conviction on each thesis and founder so that we can get our hands dirty post investment.

items.name: Hands on hard work
items.text: We invest much more than just capital. Our team is dedicated to helping each MAYAN get from Zero to One. We use our expertise and network to provide tailored support to founders in hiring, go-to-market, and fundraising. For the rest of it, we want to provoke, ask the right questions, and to provide the best answers when possible.

items.name: Long-term partnership
items.text: Our success is directly tied to that of our partners. We do our work to gain conviction before partnering with founders, so we can eventually consider ourselves a part of the team.

cards.text: We are only as good as the people around us because talent attracts talent. The exceptional people around us are our most valuable asset.
cards.title: Talent Centric

cards.text: We value agility, but only invest for the long term and where we can add real value.
cards.title: Conviction

cards.text: We won’t shy away from any challenges. In fact, we chase them.
cards.title: Boldness

cards.text: We share in the ups and downs and do what it takes to help our partners.
cards.title: Partnership First
